card.name: Spider-Man
card.text: Flash Vigilance, reach When Spider-Man enters, you may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If another creature entering causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Ultimate Spider-Man
card.text: Vigilance, reach When Ultimate Spider-Man enters, choose up to one — • Return another target creature to its owner's hand. • Return target card in a graveyard to its owner's hand.

card.name: Portal Hopping
card.text: Whenever you attack, choose up to one attacking creature you own. Exile it, then return it to the battlefield under your control tapped and attacking.

card.name: Invisible Woman
card.text: Flash When Invisible Woman enters, exile up to one other target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

card.name: Spider-Man Noir
card.text: Ward—{2}, Pay 2 life. Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, investigate. This ability triggers only once per turn. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Silvermane
card.text: When Silvermane enters, create a tapped Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Iron Man
card.text: Flying Whenever Iron Man deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of your library. You may exile an artifact card from among them. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may play the exiled card until end of turn.

card.name: Astral Projection
card.text: Exile target creature. That creature's controller creates a 1/1 blue Illusion creature token with flying.

card.name: Journey into Mystery
card.text: Flash When this enchantment enters, create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying, then exile up to one other target nonland permanent until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Magik
card.text: Flash Ward—Exile a creature you control. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player exiles a creature they control.) When Magik enters, exile up to one target attacking or blocking creature until Magik leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Blind Justice
card.text: Choose one— • Exile target tapped creature. • Exile target planeswalker that was activated this turn.

card.name: Banish to Limbo
card.text: Put target creature or planeswalker on the bottom of its owner's library. Its owner may scry 1.

card.name: Purge the Occult
card.text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Spider-Man 2099
card.text: Flash Flying When Spider-Man 2099 enters the battlefield, target spell loses all card types and abilities, and becomes an instant with "Draw a card." until it resolves. (It keeps its colors and mana value.)

card.name: Vibranium Shield
All Gods Must Die
card.text: Destroy all legendary creatures.

card.name: Suit Up
card.text: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. When you put an Equipment onto the battlefield this way, you may attach it to target creature.

card.name: Think
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Psychic Knife
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a creature you control to its owner's hand or pay {1}. Counter target spell.

card.name: Two Steps Ahead
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays twice {X}.

card.name: Mystic Arts
card.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, you may cast a blue spell with mana value 2 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Imperius Rex
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target spell unless its controller pays twice {X}. • Create an X/X blue Kraken creature token.

card.name: Scrutinize
card.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. An opponent chooses a card revealed this way. Exile the chosen card, then put the rest into your hand.

card.name: Kang the Conqueror
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a card exiled with Kang into its owner's hand. [+1]: Draw two cards, then exile two cards from your hand. [-2]: Exile another target nonland permanent with two time counters on it. It gains suspend. [-6]: Search your library for any number of noncreature, nonland cards and exile them. Then put up to three cards exiled with Kang into their owners' hands.

card.name: Rescue Armor
card.text: Flash When Rescue Armor enters, exile target creature you own. Return it to the battlefield, then attach Rescue Armor to it. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has flying. Equip {2}

card.name: Shifting Identity
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You may have a creature you control become a copy of it until end of turn.

card.name: Burning Fear
card.text: Destroy target creature if it has power, toughness, or mana value 2 or less.

card.name: Take Aim
card.text: Destroy target creature that didn't enter this turn.

card.name: Elegy
card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. That permanent's controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Death Spores
card.text: Death Spores deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. You gain life equal to the amount of excess damage dealt this way.

card.name: Hunt to Extinction
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less. Overload {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

card.name: No More
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. If you sacrificed a permanent this way, draw two cards.

card.name: Mister Negative
card.text: When Mister Negative enters the battlefield, target creature you don't control gets -X/-Y until end of turn, where X is its toughness and Y is its power. (For example, a 2/3 creature would get -3/-2 until end of turn.)

card.name: Mephisto
card.text: [+2]: Create two 1/1 red Devil creature tokens with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target." [-3]: Target player draws three cards and loses 3 life. [-9]: You get an emblem with "If you would draw a card, instead search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle."

card.name: Knull, King in Black
card.text: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn. [-3]: Create a 3/3 black Alien Dragon creature token with flying. [-8]: Each creature you don't control gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Dormammu
card.text: [+2]: Each player discards a card. Dormammu deals 1 damage to each opponent. [-X]: Up to one target creature gets twice -X/-X until end of turn. You gain X life. [-8]: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Optic Blast
card.text: Optic Blast deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Excess damage is dealt to that permanent's controller instead.

card.name: Trickshot
card.text: This spell can't be countered, and can target creatures with hexproof as though they didn't have hexproof. Trickshot deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Fin Fang Foom
card.text: Flying Whenever Fin Fang Foom enters the battlefield or attacks, he deals 3 damage to each of up to three targets. {2}{R}, Discard Fin Fang Foom: He deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Fastball Special
card.text: Choose one — • Fastball Special deals 3 damage to any target. • Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Fastball Special deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

card.name: Fatal Attractions
card.text: Choose one or both — • Destroy all artifacts. • Fatal Attractions deals 4 damage to each creature and planeswalker.

card.name: Energy Conduit
card.text: Choose one — • Energy Conduit deals 4 damage to any target. • Energy Conduit deals 2 damage to each creature and planeswalker you don't control.

card.name: Fortune Favors the Bold
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until end of turn. At the beginning of your end step, Fortune Favors the Bold deals damage to each player equal to the number of cards exiled with it.

card.name: Life-Model Decoy
card.text: Whenever you attack, you may have Life-Model Decoy become a copy of target attacking creature until end of turn, except it's a 0/0 colorless Robot artifact creature with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control." If you do, Life-Model Decoy becomes tapped and attacking.

card.name: High Evolutionary
card.text: [+1]: Put two counters of your choice from among +1/+1, trample, and vigilance on up to one target creature. (You can choose the same counter twice.) [-1]: Create a 3/3 green Construct creature token. [-6]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on it and draw a card."

card.name: A Day Unlike Any Other
card.text: Untap target creature you control that attacked this turn. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Overload {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

card.name: Hell Cycle
card.text: Menace Start your engines! (If you have no speed, it starts at 1. It increases once on each of your turns when an opponent loses life. Max speed is 4.) Max speed — At the beginning of combat on your turn, Hell Cycle becomes a Demon artifact creature until end of turn. Crew 3

card.name: Crowd Favorite
card.text: Spectacle {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Discard your hand, then draw three cards.

card.name: Savage Land Expedition
card.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color. {4}{G}, Sacrifice this Aura: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Seismic Shifting
card.text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Into the Cosmos
card.text: Search your library for a land card with a basic land type, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Up to one target creature explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Origin Story
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card with mana value 3 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Kraven's Last Hunt
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) Mill three cards. When you do, you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand. Until end of turn, you may cast creature spells from your graveyard. (You still pay their costs. Timing rules still apply.) ​

card.name: Clobber
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact or enchantment. • Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

card.name: Maestro
card.text: [+1]: Until end of turn, Maestro becomes a 6/6 green Giant Noble creature with trample and indestructible. (He doesn't lose loyalty while he isn't a planeswalker.) [-2]: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to target creature or planeswalker. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control are 6/6 Giants with trample in addition to their other types and abilities."

card.name: Flora Colossus
card.text: Choose one — • Search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. • Create a green Treefolk creature token with reach and "This token's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control." Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Plot Armor
card.text: Target permanent gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. If it's a creature, it also gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Red Ghost
card.text: When Red Ghost enters, create three 2/2 green Ape creature tokens. Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked or becomes the target of a spell or ability, you may have that creature phase out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Captain America
card.text: Vigilance, reach Whenever Captain America attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature you control.

card.name: Black Widow
card.text: Ward—Discard a card. Whenever Black Widow attacks, look at the top card of defending player's library and exile it face down. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

card.name: Havok
card.text: Flash When Havok enters, if you cast him, destroy target attacking creature. Overload {4}{W}{W} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

card.name: Loki, God of Mischief
card.text: Flash When Loki enters, copy target spell, then return that spell to its owner's hand. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

card.name: White Tiger
card.text: When White Tiger enters and whenever you cast a creature spell, you gain 1 life and create a 1/1 green and white Cat Spirit creature token.

card.name: Blade
card.text: Once during each of your turns, you may cast a creature spell with mana value 1 from your graveyard. If you cast a spell this way, that creature enters with a finality counter on it. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)

card.name: Man-Thing
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Man-Thing attacks, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It becomes a 4/3 Plant Horror creature that's tapped and attacking.

card.name: Lock Up
card.text: Flash When Lock Up enters, exile target creature or planeswalker until Lock Up leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Warpath
card.text: When Warpath enters, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. If you revealed a Mutant this way, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Beast
card.text: Beast can't be blocked by creatures with lesser power. Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Beast. If that spell was a Mutant, draw a card.

card.name: Brood Spawning
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature of their choice. Create a 2/2 black Insect creature token with flying. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Summon the Horsemen
card.text: Return from your graveyard to the battlefield up to four target creature cards that each have mana value X or less.

card.name: Bishop
card.text: When Bishop enters the battlefield, up to one target artifact, instant, or sorcery card in your graveyard gains jump-start until end of turn. (You may cast it from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. If it would be put into a graveyard, exile it.)

card.name: Iron Fist
card.text: Kicker {3}{R}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R}{R} as you cast this spell.) When Iron Fist enters, if he was kicked, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying. At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains first strike and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Juggernaut
card.text: Menace Whenever Juggernaut becomes the target of a spell, Juggernaut deals 2 damage to that spell's controller. If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, instead it deals double that damage.

card.name: Shocker
card.text: Haste When Shocker enters, he deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it can't block this turn.

card.name: Gambit
card.text: When Gambit enters, you may discard any number of cards. Gambit deals X damage to each opponent and you draw X cards, where X is the greatest number of sequential mana values among cards discarded this way. (Lands have mana value 0. If you discard one card, X is 1.)

card.name: Ka-Zar // Savage Might
card.text:
{T}: Add {G}. {2}{G}, {T}: Return Ka-Zar to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
---
Create two 3/3 green Dinosaur creature tokens with trample. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

prop.type: Legendary Creature — Human Warrior // Sorcery — Adventure

card.name: Ghost Rider
card.text: Ghost Rider can't block. Start your engines! (If you have no speed, it starts at 1. It increases once on each of your turns when an opponent loses life. Max speed is 4.) Max speed — {3}{B}{B}: Return Ghost Rider from your graveyard to the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Sinister Scheme
card.text: Return any number of target creature cards with total mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Spirit of Vengeance
card.text: Start your engines! (If you have no speed, it starts at 1. It increases once on each of your turns when an opponent loses life. Max speed is 4.) Sacrifice this enchantment: Return target creature card with mana value less than or equal to your speed from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Zabu
card.text: Vigilance The first creature spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast.

card.name: Vision
card.text: Flash Flying Whenever you cast a spell, you may phase out target creature. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Silk
card.text: {2}{W}: Tap target creature. Until end of turn, its activated abilities can't be activated. Activate only during your turn and only once each turn.

card.name: Jessica Jones
card.text: Vigilance When Jessica Jones enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") As long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn, Jessica Jones has flying.

card.name: Shadowcat
card.text: Whenever Shadowcat enters or phases in, if you don't control a creature named Lockheed, create Lockheed, a legendary 2/2 blue Alien Dragon creature token with flying. At the beginning of your end step, Shadowcat phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Carnage
card.text: Carnage enters with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Carnage. When Carnage dies, put its counters on target creature you control.

card.name: Venom
card.text: Menace Creatures you control with counters on them have menace. At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

card.name: Wasp
card.text: Flying When Wasp enters, scry 1. Then if you control another Hero, draw a card.

card.name: Warlock
card.text: You may have Warlock enter as a copy of any permanent on the battlefield, except his name is Warlock and he's an artifact in addition to his other types.

card.name: Thor, God of Thunder
card.text: Flying When Thor enters, he deals 3 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker and you gain 3 life. Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Peni Parker
card.text: When Peni Parker enters, create SP//dr, a legendary 2/2 colorless Vehicle artifact token with crew 1. (It has "Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.")

card.name: SPDR MRV
card.text: Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Anti-Venom
card.text: When Anti-Venom enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Edwin Jarvis
card.text: When Edwin Jarvis enters, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card or a legendary creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Moon Knight
card.text: When Moon Knight dies, if he attacked this turn, return him to the battlefield tapped under his owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Shang-Chi
card.text: Vigilance, lifelink When Shang-Chi enters, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on Shang-Chi. • Exile target artifact or enchantment until Shang-Chi leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Falcon
card.text: Flying When Falcon enters, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Valkyrie
card.text: Flying Whenever Valkyrie attacks, you may put a creature card with mana value 2 or less from your hand or graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Cosmo the Spacedog
card.text: Vigilance When Cosmo the Spacedog enters, look at target player's hand, then choose a nonland card type. Spells of the chosen type cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Heimdall, the All-Seeing
card.text: Vigilance You may look at the top card of your library at any time. You may cast creature spells from the top of your library if they have mana value less than or equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Nick Fury
card.text: During your turn, Nick Fury has first strike. Whenever you attack, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking, then put a +1/+1 counter on an attacking creature you control.

card.name: Black Bolt
card.text: Flying When Black Bolt enters, choose a noncreature, nonland card type. Each opponent can't cast spells of the chosen type.

card.name: Sentry
card.text: Flying, lifelink When Sentry dies, you may pay 4 life. If you do, create The Void, a legendary 4/4 black Avatar Villain creature token with flying and deathtouch.

card.name: Void MRV
card.text: Flying, deathtouch

card.name: Blink
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Blink deals combat damage to a player, exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Lockjaw
card.text: When Lockjaw enters, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Wiccan
card.text: Flying Whenever Wiccan attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If that card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile it instead. (You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Iceman
card.text: Ward {2} When Iceman enters, choose target creature. It loses all creature types and abilities and becomes a 0/4 blue Wall creature with defender for as long as you control Iceman.

card.name: Mystique
card.text: You may have Mystique enter as a copy of target creature, except her name is Mystique, and she has her other abilities. {3}{U}: Mystique becomes a copy of target creature, except her name is Mystique, and she has this ability. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Psylocke
card.text: Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Psylocke deals combat damage to a player, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard two cards.

card.name: Cable
card.text: Flash When Cable enters, return target artifact, instant, or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Nightcrawler
card.text: Flash When Nightcrawler enters, scry 1. Whenever Nightcrawler attacks, exile him. After blockers are declared, return him to the battlefield. If it's his owner's combat phase, he enters tapped and attacking.

card.name: Mysterio
card.text: Flying Illusions you control get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 blue Illusion creature token with flying.

card.name: Elektra
card.text: Elektra can't block. Ninjutsu {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) You may activate Elektra's ninjutsu ability from your graveyard.

card.name: Swarm
card.text: When Swarm dies, create a number of 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying equal to his power. Escape—{3}{B}{B}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.) Swarm escapes with two +1/+1 counters on him.

card.name: Mole Man
card.text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 2/1 black Mole Gremlin creature token with "This creature can't block." Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Black Cat
card.text: Menace Whenever Black Cat deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you lose 1 life and create a Treasure token. {1}{B}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card.

card.name: Morbius
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever another creature or planeswalker dies, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {B}{B}, Sacrifice two Blood tokens: Return Morbius from your graveyard to the battlefield. He can't block this turn.

card.name: Crossbones
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life. At the beginning of your end step, each opponent who lost 4 or more life this turn discards a card.

card.name: Hobgoblin
card.text: Flying When Hobgoblin enters, you lose 1 life, then look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: The Hood
card.text: When The Hood enters, mill four cards. You may put a creature or planeswalker card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. Planeswalkers you control have "[+2]: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with ‘When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.'"

card.name: Kingpin
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: You gain 2 life. {B}, Discard a card: Create a tapped 2/2 black Mercenary creature token. {B}{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

card.name: Prowler
card.text: If an opponent was dealt combat damage this turn, you may pay {B}{B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Ward—Pay 2 life. At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent was dealt combat damage this turn, you may draw a card.

card.name: Doctor Doom
card.text: You may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere other than your library or hand, exile it instead.

card.name: Omega Red
card.text: Haste When Omega Red enters, each other creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Omega Red.

card.name: Annihilus
card.text: Flying When Annihilus enters, create two 2/2 black Alien Insect creature tokens with flying. Whenever Annihilus or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses life equal to that creature's power.

card.name: Hela, Goddess of Death
card.text: Indestructible When Hela enters, search your library for up to two creature cards, put them into your graveyard, then shuffle. {2}{B}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.

card.name: Kate Bishop
card.text: As long as it's your turn, Kate Bishop has first strike. When Kate Bishop enters or attacks, she deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Quicksilver
card.text: Haste As long as Quicksilver entered the battlefield this turn, he gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked except by creatures with haste. Dash {R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Red Guardian
card.text: Red Guardian can't block. Whenever Red Guardian attacks, target creature with lesser power can't block this turn.

card.name: Jubilee
card.text: Jubilee can't block. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Jubilee. Remove three +1/+1 counters from Jubilee: Discard your hand, then draw three cards.

card.name: Deadpool
card.text: Deadpool can't block. While Deadpool is outside the game, you may put him into your hand by revealing him and exiling a red card from your hand. If Deadpool would be put into a graveyard or exile from anywhere, you may instead put him into your sideboard.

card.name: Pyro
card.text: Whenever Pyro enters or you cast a red spell, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token with haste and "This creature attacks each combat if able."

card.name: Taskmaster
card.text: Haste Whenever Taskmaster attacks, you may have him become a copy of another target creature until end of turn, except his name is still Taskmaster and he has this ability.

card.name: Storm
card.text: Flash Flying When Storm enters, if you cast her, copy target instant or sorcery spell twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

card.name: Drax the Destroyer
card.text: Trample Whenever another creature you control enters, Drax deals damage equal to that creature's power to up to one target creature or planeswalker. Excess damage is dealt to that permanent's controller.

card.name: Snowbird
card.text: Flying {T}: Add {G}. {1}{G}: Until end of turn, Snowbird becomes a 2/2 Bear creature and loses all other abilities. Activate only outside of combat.

card.name: Crystal
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {4}{G}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Elemental creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Diablo
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. When you spend this mana to cast a creature spell, scry 1.

card.name: Absorbing Man
card.text: Trample Absorbing Man gets +1/+1 for each card type among permanents you control. (The permanent card types are artifact, battle, creature, enchantment, land, and planeswalker.)

card.name: Lizard
card.text: Whenever Lizard enters or attacks, you may exile target card from a graveyard. If you do, Lizard gains indestructible until end of turn. Then if you exiled a creature card this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Lizard.

card.name: Multiple Man
card.text: When Multiple Man enters, choose X. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Create a 3/2 green Mutant Rogue Hero creature token. • Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Black Panther
card.text: When Black Panther enters, return up to one target land card and up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Hawkeye
card.text: Vigilance, reach You may have Hawkeye assign combat damage as though he weren't blocked. When Hawkeye enters, he deals damage equal to his power to target creature with flying you don't control.

card.name: Rogue
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may have Rogue become a copy of that creature until end of turn, except her name is Rogue and she has deathtouch and this ability.

card.name: Gorilla-Man
card.text: When Gorilla-Man enters, mill four cards. When Gorilla-Man dies, you may exile him. When you do, exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 3/3 green Ape in addition to its other types and has this ability.

card.name: Abomination
card.text: Trample, haste {2}{G}, Sacrifice two creatures: Return Abomination from your graveyard to the battlefield. He can't block this turn.

card.name: Colossus
card.text: Trample Whenever Colossus attacks, until end of turn, another target attacking creature you control gets +X/+X and gains trample, where X is Colossus's power as this ability resolves.

card.name: Kraven the Hunter
card.text: When Kraven the Hunter enters, if he was cast, search your library for a green creature card with mana value X or less, where X is the number of creatures you control. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Rhino
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Rhino has hexproof if he hasn't dealt damage to a player or planeswalker yet. Whenever a creature dealt combat damage by Rhino this turn dies, put two +1/+1 counters on Rhino.

card.name: Deathlok
card.text: Modular X (This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.) {4}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Deathlok. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Ultron
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. Flying, trample Sacrifice an artifact: Ultron gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Machine Man
card.text: Machine Man gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.

card.name: Silver Surfer
card.text: Flying When Silver Surfer enters, search your library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle.

card.name: Casket of Ancient Winters
card.text: Casket of Ancient Winters enters tapped. When it does, choose a color other than blue. {T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Crimson Gem of Cyttorak
card.text: Crimson Gem of Cyttorak enters tapped. When it does, choose a color other than red. {T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Darkhold
card.text: Darkhold enters tapped. When it does, choose a color other than black. {T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Eye of Agamotto
card.text: Eye of Agamotto enters tapped. When it does, choose a color other than white. {T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Jade Tiger Amulet
card.text: Jade Tiger Amulet enters tapped. When it does, choose a color other than green. {T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Infinity Gems
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. As long as you control six or more artifacts, you may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Black Vortex
card.text: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.) As you cast spells from your hand, they gain cascade.

card.name: Iron Man Armor
card.text: Equipped creature has flying. Whenever you draw a card, equipped creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. Equip {2}

card.name: Staff of One
card.text: Staff of One enters tapped unless you've lost life this turn. {T}: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, exile it, then shuffle. Until end of turn, you may cast that spell by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost. Activate only during your turn.

card.name: Doctor Strange
card.text: Flying, prowess Once each turn, when you cast an instant, sorcery, or enchantment spell, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

card.name: Delusions of Grandeur
card.text: Counter target spell. Its controller loses life equal to its mana value.

card.name: Emma Frost
card.text: When Emma Frost enters, gain control of target creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: World War Hulk
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after VII.) Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card with mana value equal to the number of lore counters on World War Hulk. Put that card onto the battlefield, then put the rest of the cards onto the bottom of your library in a random order. ​ ​

card.name: Avengers Assemble
card.text: Choose X, then create a creature token for each of the chosen characteristics. • 2/2 white God with vigilance and lifelink. • 2/3 blue Artificer with flying and ward {2}. • 1/3 black Shapeshifter with deathtouch. • 2/1 red Warrior with flying and haste. • 3/2 green Giant with trample.

card.name: Bring to Balance
card.text: Each player sacrifices half the creatures they control. Repeat this process for artifacts, enchantments, and planeswalkers. Then, each player discards half their hand. Round up each time.

card.name: Wolverine
card.text: Trample When Wolverine enters, he fights up to one target creature you don't control. {1}: Wolverine gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap him.

card.name: Cloak and Dagger
card.text: Whenever Cloak and Dagger attack, choose one — • Each opponent discards a card. • Cloak and Dagger deal 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Glimpse Infinite Realities
card.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library, then separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of the piles. You put the chosen pile into your hand, then Glimpse Infinite Realities deals damage to that opponent equal to the total mana value of the other pile.

card.name: Magneto
card.text: Flying, ward {2} At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have any number of target noncreature artifacts you control become 3/3 artifact creatures with haste until end of turn.

card.name: Mister Sinister
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature or discard a creature card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mister Sinister. When you do, search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If it has mana value less than Mister Sinister's power, put it on to the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Cyclops
card.text: Vigilance Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Whenever Cyclops mentors a creature, both he and that creature gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Ant-Man
card.text: Whenever Ant-Man enters, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with flying. {X}{GU}: Until end of turn, target creature you control has base power and toughness X/X. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: The Collector
card.text: [+1]: Choose a nonland card type. Until end of turn, spells you cast of that type cost {1} less to cast. [-2]: Draw two cards. If there are four or more card types among permanents you control, instead draw four cards. [-6]: You get an emblem with "You may cast spells that share a card type with a permanent you control without paying their mana costs."

card.name: Hulk
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Trample, haste Whenever Hulk becomes the target of a spell or ability you don't control, he deals damage equal to his power to any target.

card.name: Daredevil
card.text: Vigilance, ward {1} Creatures your opponents control enter tapped.

card.name: Annihilation Wave
card.text: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X or less. Then if X was 3 or greater, create three 2/2 black Insect creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Thanos, the Mad Titan
card.text: [+1]: You may draw a card. If you don't, create a Treasure token. Repeat this process once. [-4]: Search your library for a multicolored card, exile it, then shuffle. You may cast that spell without paying its mana cost. [-9]: For each opponent, exile half of the permanents that player controls, rounded up.

card.name: Scarlet Witch
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may discard a card. If you do, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Scarlet Witch deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Green Goblin
card.text: Flying Green Goblin can't block. Whenever a player loses life, put a +1/+1 counter on Green Goblin. This ability triggers only once per turn for each player.

card.name: Electro
card.text: Electro can't block. Whenever Electro attacks, he deals 1 damage to each player.

card.name: Sandman
card.text: Lands you control enter untapped. Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create a 1/1 green Sand creature token.

card.name: Professor X
card.text: {3}{U}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a Mutant creature card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Winter Soldier
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {2}. When Winter Soldier enters, he deals 3 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Killmonger
card.text: When Killmonger enters, create a 2/2 green Cat creature token. {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

card.name: Thing
card.text: Trample Whenever Thing attacks while you control four or more creatures, double his power until end of turn.

card.name: Nightmare
card.text: [+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand then exile the other. [-2]: Each opponent exiles a creature they control. Each opponent who can't exiles a card from their hand. [-4]: Put a permanent card exiled with Nightmare onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Khonshu, God of the Moon
card.text: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. It gains vigilance until end of turn. [-2]: Create two 1/1 white Cleric creature tokens with lifelink. [-6]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. It gains vigilance and indestructible until end of turn."

card.name: Baron Mordo
card.text: Lifelink Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay life equal to its mana value. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Ragnarok
card.text: Choose two card types from among creature, planeswalker, artifact, and enchantment. For each permanent with one or more card types chosen this way, its controller shuffles it into their library.

card.name: Days of Future Past
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) Return all nonland permanents with mana value 2 or less to their owner's hands. Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Exile this Saga. When you do, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Absolute Zero
card.text: Choose one— • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Tap target nonland permanent and put two stun counters on it. For as long as that permanent remains tapped, its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Precognition
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them all on top or bottom of your library in any order. Draw a card.

card.name: Vigorous Research
card.text: Surveil 2, then draw a card. If this spell wasn't cast from your hand, create a tapped 2/2 colorless Robot artifact creature token. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.) Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Mister Fantastic
card.text: Vigilance, reach Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 colorless Robot artifact creature token. Whenever you draw your fourth card each turn, put four +1/+1 counters on Mister Fantastic.

card.name: Age of Ultron
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) Each player sacrifices a nonartifact creature. Return up to one target creature or artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its mana value. ​

card.name: Human Torch
card.text: Flying Whenever you attack for the first time each turn, untap up to four target attacking creatures. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: H.E.R.B.I.E.
card.text: When H.E.R.B.I.E. enters, search your library for a Hero card, reveal it, then shuffle. If that card is named Invisible Woman, Mister Fantastic, Human Torch, or Thing, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put that card on top of your library.

card.name: Academy Training
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Until end of turn, it gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card."

card.name: Ghost-Spider
card.text: Flash When Ghost-Spider enters, target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Start Your Engines! MRV
card.text: Whenever an opponent loses life during your turn, if your speed is 1 or greater, increase your speed by 1. Max speed is 4. This ability triggers only once each turn.
